book.title: Very simple book with mathematical formulas

chapter.para: The Java package \JLaTeXMath combining with FOP gives the possibility to write \LaTeX commands in Docbook.

para.latex: \phi_n(\kappa) = \frac{1}{4\pi^2\kappa^2} \int_0^\infty \frac{\sin(\kappa R)}{\kappa R} \frac{\partial}{\partial R}\left[ R^2\frac{\partial D_n(R)}{\partial R}\right]\,dR

chapter.para: The formulas can be in displaystyle \sum_{n=1}^{+\infty}\frac1{n^2}=\frac{\pi^2}{6} or in textstyle \sum_{n=1}^{+\infty}\frac1{n^2}=\frac{\pi^2}{6}.
